name: esqlate
description: The front page of the Esqlate project

scripts.front: node esqlate-startup.js build-front && cd ./dep-esqlate-front && npm start
scripts.server: node esqlate-startup.js build-server && cd ./dep-esqlate-server && npm start
scripts.test: npm run-script front-prepare && npm run-script server-prepare

author: Matt Forrester
